title: Jones On Fire v1.2
description:
Jones on Fire - a high-speed action game of kitty saving and flame evading, running and jumping, where YOU are the hero!

Become Emma Jones, firefighter extraordinaire, tough cookie and kitten lover. Beat 10 levels of dangerous mountain terrain, improving JonesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ skills with every fluffy life saved. 

Dominate your friends on the kitty-saving leaderboards, and gain the adoration of millions of cats!

Save the kitties! YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re their only hope!

Features:

- Fast, frenetic, side-scrolling fun
- Intuitive controls
- Juicy running and jumping physics
- Fun in short bursts, but addictive enough for longer plays
- Upgrade Jones with increasingly spiffy fire-fighting skills
- Blocky, retro visuals with just a touch of the modern
- Rockin' tunes

What's New:

* Updated to latest engine version, should increase stability and general performance
* Added once-per-day news system, to keep players in the loop with what Glass Bottom Games is working on
